name: Guidez-les Tous
description:
Dirigez-les Tous is an arcade-style game, the player must direct customers to the office that suits their needs.

Above each customer, an icon symbolizes their needs, so you have to type on the desktop with the same icon, when the customer is on the carpet in the center.

Context :      1st Year School Project

Platform :     Android

Engine :          Android Studio

Language :   JAVA

Task :               Lead Programmer - UI Designer

Duration :    3 Weeks

Team size :  3
